item.title: The music Venue Kachette is too loud all night long, 26th October
item.description:
The venue kachette is not respecting their neighbors and playing incredibly loud music and bass that shakes my bed and walls until 3-4 am and have early trucks coming in the next day at 6-7 am. It is impossible to sleep. This has been happened 10+ times
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Old Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree with low branches over pavement, 26th October
item.description:
The silver birch tree, which is very nice and healthy, needs a prune back as it has become very large with branches very low over pavement. Leading to a lot of leaves on pavement and a trip hazard in wet conditions. A lovely feature on the street so no more than a prune back needed but needed all around the tree not just roadside.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Hollingbourne Road, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree, 26th October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Terrace Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very poor tarmac surface, 26th October
item.description:
Previously complained in 2017 for the very poor new tarmac pavement covering outside number 8 which leads to our pathway being flooded in heavy rain. Still no remedy and now the curbside has had a paving stone removed and replaced with more very poor tarmac covering as shown in photos. No preparation or removal of old concrete and already breaking away.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Hollingbourne Road, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet
